nodes.text: IM-2M was an IM series security droid manufactured by Droid Security Systems and stationed in the Star Tours terminal of Spaceport THX1138 by about the year 1 BBY. It had multiple black, red, and white sensors, as well as blue and silver plating.

IM-2M was created for Tokyo Disneyland's simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours: The Adventures Continue, which opened on May 7, 2013. It was identified by a container located in the ride's queue, where it hung from the ceiling on a fixture.
